Title: 71913 - ES - User Mgmt - Create a New Role (State User) - OnLoad, Search and Action Navigation: Populate Roles and Permissions Screen

Test Steps.Step Action:
Pre-requisites:
- Have 2 existing role with the Type of Role as "State Role"
- Have 2 existing role with the Type of Role as "County Role"
- Have 2 existing role with the Type of Role as "Jury Role"
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n
Dashboard is displayed \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to System Management > Users > Maintain Roles\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Roles And Permissions page is displayed\n

The following search criteria will be displayed:
- Role Name
- Role Code
- Type of Role
- "SEARCH" and "RESET" buttons
An "ADD" button is displayed

The 6 existing Roles you have will be displayed here and the following columns will be shown with the correct information:
- Actions
- Role Name
- Role Code
- Type of Role
- Date Created
- Date Modified
Roles are displayed in alphabetical order based on the Role Name
All columns except "Action" can be sorted by ascending or descending order
The pagination will display the correct amount of records and allows the user to access the next pages of records if the page limit has gone over

Test Steps.Step Action: Use the "Role Name" search criteria to search for one of the existing Roles
Test Steps.Step Expected: Only the roles including the Role Name you searched for will be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Use wildcard searches in the "Role Name" search criteria
Test Steps.Step Expected: All search results are correct

Test Steps.Step Action: Use the "Role Code" search criteria to search for one of the existing Roles\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Only the roles including the Role Code you searched for will be displayed\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Use wildcard searches in the "Role Code" search criteria \n
Test Steps.Step Expected: All search results are correct\n

Test Steps.Step Action: From the "Type of Role" search criteria dropdown select the "State Role" option and search
Test Steps.Step Expected: All Roles that have the role type of "State Role" will be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Repeat for all other role types
Test Steps.Step Expected: All role type searches work as expected

Test Steps.Step Action: Use the search criteria to search for a record that doesn't exist
Test Steps.Step Expected: The page will not list any records and will display a message saying "No roles found"

Title: 71914 - ES - User Mgmt - Create a New Role (State User) - Add/Maintain roles in the Roles and Permissions Screen

Test Steps.Step Expected: Dashboard is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to System Management > Users > Maintain Roles
Test Steps.Step Expected: Roles And Permissions page is displayed
Add Role page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Fill in the required fields and click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: A success message is displayed and the Role is created

Test Steps.Step Action: Find the Role you just created and click on the "Actions" ellipsis next to it
Test Steps.Step Expected: Options displayed
The Update Role page is displayed and the fields will be pre-populated with existing data

Test Steps.Step Action: Make any desired changes and click "UPDATE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: A success message is displayed and the Role will be updated

Test Steps.Step Action: Find the Role you just created and click on the "Actions" ellipsis next to it
Test Steps.Step Expected: Options displayed
A confirmation box is displayed
Nothing will happen and the Role is not deleted
Options displayed
A confirmation box is displayed
The Role will be deleted
test 1
